channel.title: Legend-Pkz The Evolution of 317 RSPS Gaming :)
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i1067.photobucket.com/albums/u429/bludstained/5f0642a4.jpg[/img]
Legend-Pkz is a new server made and coded by Paul and Braden with a lot of different features and capabilities. This server is still fairly new so there's a lot being added each and every day, and the best part we listen to our players suggestions! One of the main things that could be considered great about Legend-Pkz is that the staff take into account all the members suggestions and nobody gets left out. We take care of our members as a great part of the gaming community.
[CENTER][U]Features[/U][/CENTER] [list] *Squeal Of Fortune *Bosses (Corporeal Beast, Frost Dragons, Strykewyrms, Tormented Demons & More!) *Skilling and Advanced Skilling Areas! *Fully working Slayer and PvP Shops! *Fully Working Curses! *Korasi + Spec! *Zaryate Bow and a Custom Spec! *Lots of Customs as well a Custom Home! *Custom Donator Items! *And Lots Lots More With Daily Updates!
[CENTER]Slayer Shop[/CENTER] [IMG]http://i1067.photobucket.com/albums/u429/bludstained/9a1aa56c.png[/img]
[CENTER]PvP Shop[/CENTER] [IMG]http://i1067.photobucket.com/albums/u429/bludstained/a4b4447e.png[/img]
[CENTER]Custom Informative Quest Tab[/CENTER] [IMG]http://i1067.photobucket.com/albums/u429/bludstained/273f9b89.png[/img]
[CENTER]Working Tormented Demons[/CENTER] [IMG]http://i1067.photobucket.com/albums/u429/bludstained/6416f131.png[/img]
[CENTER]Working Frost Dragons[/CENTER] [IMG]http://i1067.photobucket.com/albums/u429/bludstained/18229b6f.png[/img]
[CENTER]Working Curses![/CENTER] [IMG]http://i1067.photobucket.com/albums/u429/bludstained/f0bb6733.png[/img]
[CENTER]Custom Player Shops (YOU SET THE PRICE!)[/CENTER] [IMG]http://i1067.photobucket.com/albums/u429/bludstained/6734eaa2.png[/img]
[CENTER]Working Dicing![/CENTER] [IMG]http://i1067.photobucket.com/albums/u429/bludstained/f0bb6733.png[/img]
And A LOT More!
So what are you waiting for? Give our server a try and you won't be disappointed! Remember we listen to our players so feel free to voice your opinion on the server all criticism is appreciated!
[CENTER]Server Links[/CENTER] HomePage: http://legend-pkz.spruz.com/ Forum: http://legend-pkz.spruz.com/discussion.htm, http://http://officiallegendpkz.forumotion.com/ Webclient: http://legend-pkz.spruz.com/play.htm
[ul][li][/li] [li][/li][/ul]

item.title: Legend-Pkz The Evolution of 317 RSPS Gaming :)
item.dc:creator: @Bludstained Bludstained
item.description:
@Bludstained wrote:

5f0642a4.jpg1021×243

Legend-Pkz is a new server made and coded by Paul and Braden with a lot of different features and capabilities. This server is still fairly new so there’s a lot being added each and every day, and the best part we listen to our players suggestions! One of the main things that could be considered great about Legend-Pkz is that the staff take into account all the members suggestions and nobody gets left out. We take care of our members as a great part of the gaming community.

[CENTER]Features[/CENTER]
[list]
*Squeal Of Fortune
*Bosses (Corporeal Beast, Frost Dragons, Strykewyrms, Tormented Demons & More!)
*Skilling and Advanced Skilling Areas!
*Fully working Slayer and PvP Shops!
*Fully Working Curses!
*Korasi + Spec!
*Zaryate Bow and a Custom Spec!
*Lots of Customs as well a Custom Home!
*Custom Donator Items!
*And Lots Lots More With Daily Updates!

[CENTER]Slayer Shop[/CENTER]

[CENTER]PvP Shop[/CENTER]

[CENTER]Custom Informative Quest Tab[/CENTER]

[CENTER]Working Tormented Demons[/CENTER]

[CENTER]Working Frost Dragons[/CENTER]

[CENTER]Working Curses![/CENTER]

[CENTER]Custom Player Shops (YOU SET THE PRICE!)[/CENTER]

[CENTER]Working Dicing![/CENTER]

And A LOT More!

So what are you waiting for? Give our server a try and you won’t be disappointed! Remember we listen to our players so feel free to voice your opinion on the server all criticism is appreciated!
